meanings.definition: Made thinner or weaker by adding water or another solvent.
meanings.sent2: The diluted paint was too light to cover the wall properly.
meanings.sent3: She tried to make a diluted soup, but it ended up tasting like plain water.
meanings.sent4: His diluted strength was no match for the heavy box.
meanings.sent5: The diluted solution was as weak as a kitten.

meanings.sent1: The diluted coffee was too weak for my taste.
meanings.sent2: The diluted perfume had lost its original scent.
meanings.sent3: He felt like a diluted version of himself after staying up all night.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded diluted over the phone.
meanings.sent5: The diluted medicine had little effect on his headache.
